promptPrefix:
Generate a heartfelt and personalized birthday wish for [Name]. Start by expressing your warmest wishes and congratulations on their special day. Acknowledge their unique qualities and the positive impact they have had on your life. Share a special memory or moment that highlights your connection with them. Offer words of encouragement, inspiration, and well-wishes for the coming year. Finally, end the message with a genuine expression of love, appreciation, and the hope for an amazing celebration. Remember to keep the tone light, joyful, and filled with positivity.
Keep the length above 1000 words
[TARGETLANGUAGE]  [PROMPT]
title: Birthday wishes for Anyone
